name: TV Renamer
tagline: A Java GUI utility to rename TV episodes from TV listings
body:
TVRenamer is a Java GUI utility to rename TV episodes from TV listings  
Basically, it will take an ugly filename like **Lost.S06E05.DD51.720p.WEB-DL.AVC-FUSiON.mkv** and rename it to **Lost [6x05] Lighthouse.mkv**

## Features
 * Rename many different shows at once
 * Customise the format and content of the resulting filename
 * Native look & feel for your operating system
 * Drag & Drop or standard 'add file' interface

## [Screenshots](https://github.com/tvrenamer/tvrenamer/wiki/Screenshots)
![Screenshot](https://github.com/tvrenamer/tvrenamer/wiki/tvrenamer-0.5b2.png)

## Download
Download the correct version for your operating system (OSX, Windows, Linux) and architecture (32 or 64 bit):
 * [Windows 64-bit](https://github.com/tvrenamer/tvrenamer/releases/download/0.7/TVRenamer-0.7-win64.exe)
 * [Windows 32-bit](https://github.com/tvrenamer/tvrenamer/releases/download/0.7/TVRenamer-0.7-win32.exe)
 * [OSX 64-bit](https://github.com/tvrenamer/tvrenamer/releases/download/0.7/TVRenamer-0.7-osx64.zip)
 * [OSX 32-bit](https://github.com/tvrenamer/tvrenamer/releases/download/0.7/TVRenamer-0.7-osx32.zip)
 * [Linux 64-bit](https://github.com/tvrenamer/tvrenamer/releases/download/0.7/TVRenamer-0.7-gtk64.zip)
 * [Linux 32-bit](https://github.com/tvrenamer/tvrenamer/releases/download/0.7/TVRenamer-0.7-gtk32.zip)

## More Information
For more information see [the project page](https://github.com/tvrenamer/tvrenamer)

## Open Source, Free!!!
This project is a constant work in progress developed in our free time @daveharris and @vipuldelwadia. Contributions of [bug reports](https://github.com/tvrenamer/tvrenamer/issues) or [pull requests](http://help.github.com/forking/) are always gratefully received.
The source is and always will be open!
